subject: [PATCH v6 1/3] fuse: add compound command to combine multiple requests

reviews.author: Joanne Koong
reviews.summary: Raised concerns about the necessity of the compound command and suggested that libfuse should handle everything correctly. Proposed removing the FUSE_COMPOUND_CONTINUE flag as it is confusing.

2026-02-26.patch_summary: The patch proposes adding a compound command to the fuse kernel module, allowing multiple requests to be combined into a single operation.
